net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_applyHealth
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Update all of the token states to match the passed health parameters passed as JSON:

Input object:
  {
    "id": Id of the token being modified,
    "current": Token's current hit points,
    "temporary": Token's temporary hit points
    "maximum": Token's maximum hit points
    "dsPass": Number of passed death saves for the token
    "dsFail": Number of failed death saves for the token
    "exhaustionDeath": Is the token at exhaustion level 6
  }

The macro updates the states: Bloodied, Dying, Dead, Stable
The macro updates the bars: HP, Damage, DSPass, DSFail
The macro updates the properties: HP, TempHP, MaxHP, DSPass, DSFail
The macro removes dead NPC tokens from the initiative
